scripts.build-transform-light: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/light.json core,light,theme core
scripts.build-transform-dark: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/dark.json core,dark,theme core
scripts.build-transform: npm run build-transform-core && npm run build-transform-light && npm run build-transform-dark
scripts.build: npm run build-transform && npm run build-sd && npm run build-tw
